constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 17 (Thursday, January 28, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mrs. HARTZLER:
H.R. 541.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
The bill is enacted pursuant to the power granted to
Congress under Article 1, Section 8, Clause 1 and Article 1,
Section 9, Clause 7 of the United States Constitution,
[Page H251]

latestAction.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Health.

title: Defund Planned Parenthood Act of 2021
